src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.dataDownload
[Java] Class DataProgress

java.lang.Object
  src.main.java.com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.dataDownload.DataProgress

public class DataProgress

Singleton class for the data download progress This class is used for checking the progress of requests and for displaying errors within the data download activity. This is a singleton class, so only one object of this class can be instantiated.

Authors:
Aidan Wynne Fewster
Version:
1.0
Since:
1.0

Parameters:
